item.title: [PI, Emu, Riot] Better slayer!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:11, topic:435969”]Uh. May I suggest reworking how you handle it and how you write your data? An enum/interface would be better imo and instead of having all of these…

[code=Java]public static final int[] LOW_TASKS = {
86
};

    public static int GIVE_REALLY_LOW_TASK() {
            return LOW_TASKS[(int) (Math.random() * LOW_TASKS.length)];
    }

    public static final int[] HAS_1_SLAYER = {
            1, 86
    };

    public static int giveTask1() {
            return HAS_1_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_1_SLAYER.length)];
    }

    public static final int[] HAS_5_SLAYER = {
            86, 60
    };

    public static int giveTask5() {
            return HAS_5_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_5_SLAYER.length)];
    }

    public static final int[] HAS_10_SLAYER = {
            60, 86
    };

    public static int giveTask10() {
            return HAS_10_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_10_SLAYER.length)];
    }[/code]

As you can see you are basically doing the same thing over and over again, just with a little bit different of numbers. If you notice that you are repeating the same thing over and over again, there is a better way to do it (through a loop most likely). IMO I would do something like…

[code=Java]
public enum Turael {
BANSHEE(15, 50, 15),
BAT(15, 50, 8),
CHICKEN(15, 50, 1),
GRIZZLY_BEAR_CUB(15, 50, 1),
CAVE_BUG(15, 50, 7),
CAVE_SLIME(15, 50, 17),
COW_CALF(15, 50, 1),
CRAWLING_HAND(15, 50, 5),
DESERT_LIZARD(15, 50, 22),
JACKAL(15, 50, 5),
DWARF(15, 50, 1),
GHOST(15, 50, 1),
GOBLIN(15, 50, 1),
ICE_FIEND(10, 20, 1),
MINOTAUR(15, 50, 1),
MONKEY(15, 50, 1),
SCORPION(15, 50, 1),
SKELETON(15, 50, 1),
SPIDER(15, 50, 1),
WOLVE(15, 50, 1),
ZOMBIE(15, 50, 1);

	int lowAssign, highAssign, levelReq;
	
	Turael(int lowAssign, int highAssign, int levelReq) {
		this.lowAssign = lowAssign;
		this.highAssign = highAssign;
		this.levelReq = levelReq;
	}

	public int getLowAssign() {
		return lowAssign;
	}

	public int getHighAssign() {
		return highAssign;
	}

	public int getLevelReq() {
		return levelReq;
	}
	
}[/code]

or maybe even make just an enum of possible assignments and then int arrays for the max and lows for number assigned. So each index would stand for a different slayer master.[/quote]

Don’t use enums much, never even looked into them. Thanks though.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI, Emu, Riot] Better slayer!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Uh. May I suggest reworking how you handle it and how you write your data? An enum/interface would be better imo and instead of having all of these…

[code=Java]public static final int[] LOW_TASKS = {
86
};

    public static int GIVE_REALLY_LOW_TASK() {
            return LOW_TASKS[(int) (Math.random() * LOW_TASKS.length)];
    }

    public static final int[] HAS_1_SLAYER = {
            1, 86
    };

    public static int giveTask1() {
            return HAS_1_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_1_SLAYER.length)];
    }

    public static final int[] HAS_5_SLAYER = {
            86, 60
    };

    public static int giveTask5() {
            return HAS_5_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_5_SLAYER.length)];
    }

    public static final int[] HAS_10_SLAYER = {
            60, 86
    };

    public static int giveTask10() {
            return HAS_10_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_10_SLAYER.length)];
    }[/code]

As you can see you are basically doing the same thing over and over again, just with a little bit different of numbers. If you notice that you are repeating the same thing over and over again, there is a better way to do it (through a loop most likely). IMO I would do something like…

[code=Java]
public enum Turael {
BANSHEE(15, 50, 15),
BAT(15, 50, 8),
CHICKEN(15, 50, 1),
GRIZZLY_BEAR_CUB(15, 50, 1),
CAVE_BUG(15, 50, 7),
CAVE_SLIME(15, 50, 17),
COW_CALF(15, 50, 1),
CRAWLING_HAND(15, 50, 5),
DESERT_LIZARD(15, 50, 22),
JACKAL(15, 50, 5),
DWARF(15, 50, 1),
GHOST(15, 50, 1),
GOBLIN(15, 50, 1),
ICE_FIEND(10, 20, 1),
MINOTAUR(15, 50, 1),
MONKEY(15, 50, 1),
SCORPION(15, 50, 1),
SKELETON(15, 50, 1),
SPIDER(15, 50, 1),
WOLVE(15, 50, 1),
ZOMBIE(15, 50, 1);

	int lowAssign, highAssign, levelReq;
	
	Turael(int lowAssign, int highAssign, int levelReq) {
		this.lowAssign = lowAssign;
		this.highAssign = highAssign;
		this.levelReq = levelReq;
	}

	public int getLowAssign() {
		return lowAssign;
	}

	public int getHighAssign() {
		return highAssign;
	}

	public int getLevelReq() {
		return levelReq;
	}
	
}[/code]

or maybe even make just an enum of possible assignments and then int arrays for the max and lows for number assigned. So each index would stand for a different slayer master.

item.title: [PI, Emu, Riot] Better slayer!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:7, topic:435969”]Add slayer gem, noob.

[code=java]
public static void checkGem(Client c) {
c.usingSlayerGem = true;
c.sendFrame126(“How am I doing so far?”, 2494);
c.sendFrame126(“Who are you?”, 2495);
c.sendFrame126(“Where are you?”, 2496);
c.sendFrame126(“Could I have a new task?”, 2497);
c.sendFrame126(“Nothing really.”, 2498);
c.sendFrame164(2492);
c.flushOutStream();
}

public static void gemTalking(Client c, int actionButtonId) {
	switch (actionButtonId) {
		case 9190: // How a doing so far?
			if (c.slayerTask != -1 && c.slayerTask > 0) {
				c.talk2("You're currently assigned to kill " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s only", "" + c.taskAmount + " more to go.", 1599);
			} else if (c.slayerTask <= 0) {
				c.talk2("You need something new to hunt.  Come and ask me", "when you can and I'll give you a new task.", 1599);
			}
			break;

		case 9191: // Who are you?
			c.talk("My name is Duradel; I'm a Slayer Master.", 1599);
			break;

		case 9192: // Where are you?
			c.talk2("You'll find me at the Slayer Tower. I'll be here", "when you need a task.", 1599);
			break;

		case 9193: // May I have a new task?
			c.talk2("Your task has been cleared. Here is", "another task.", 1599);
			c.slayerTask = -1;
			c.taskAmount = -1;				
			c.clearedTask = true;
			appendSlayerTask(c);
			break;

		case 9194:
			c.talkPlayer("Nothing really.", "");
			break;
	}
}

[/code][/quote]

Made my client crash D:

Read full topic

item.title: [PI, Emu, Riot] Better slayer!
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Add slayer gem, noob.

        public static void checkGem(Client c) {
		c.usingSlayerGem = true;
		c.sendFrame126("How am I doing so far?", 2494);
		c.sendFrame126("Who are you?", 2495);
		c.sendFrame126("Where are you?", 2496);
		c.sendFrame126("Could I have a new task?", 2497);
		c.sendFrame126("Nothing really.", 2498);
		c.sendFrame164(2492);
		c.flushOutStream();
	}

	public static void gemTalking(Client c, int actionButtonId) {
		switch (actionButtonId) {
			case 9190: // How a doing so far?
				if (c.slayerTask != -1 && c.slayerTask > 0) {
					c.talk2("You're currently assigned to kill " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s only", "" + c.taskAmount + " more to go.", 1599);
				} else if (c.slayerTask <= 0) {
					c.talk2("You need something new to hunt.  Come and ask me", "when you can and I'll give you a new task.", 1599);
				}
				break;

			case 9191: // Who are you?
				c.talk("My name is Duradel; I'm a Slayer Master.", 1599);
				break;

			case 9192: // Where are you?
				c.talk2("You'll find me at the Slayer Tower. I'll be here", "when you need a task.", 1599);
				break;

			case 9193: // May I have a new task?
				c.talk2("Your task has been cleared. Here is", "another task.", 1599);
				c.slayerTask = -1;
				c.taskAmount = -1;				
				c.clearedTask = true;
				appendSlayerTask(c);
				break;

			case 9194:
				c.talkPlayer("Nothing really.", "");
				break;
		}
	}

Read full topic

item.title: [PI, Emu, Riot] Better slayer!
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Nice addition to these forums.

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:1, topic:435969”]This includes boss tasks at level 90 slayer, and it’s very easy to edit. Simply add an npc’s ID to the end of the array for whatever level you want, and you’ll be done. Credits to jinrake.

bunch of views no replys -.- anti leech added…

[size=36pt]FOR MY BABY LOVEANDPOWER[/size]

[code]package server.model.players.skills;

import server.Server;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.util.Misc;

/**

  • Slayer.java
  • @author Nick/asshole_rule/Women

**/

public class Slayer {

public static final int[] LOW_TASKS = {
	86
};

public static int GIVE_REALLY_LOW_TASK() {
	return LOW_TASKS[(int) (Math.random() * LOW_TASKS.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_1_SLAYER = {
	1, 86
};

public static int giveTask1() {
	return HAS_1_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_1_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_5_SLAYER = {
	86, 60
};

public static int giveTask5() {
	return HAS_5_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_5_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_10_SLAYER = {
	60, 86
};

public static int giveTask10() {
	return HAS_10_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_10_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_15_SLAYER = {
	9, 86, 60
};

public static int giveTask15() {
	return HAS_15_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_15_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_20_SLAYER = {
	9, 86, 60, 35
};

public static int giveTask20() {
	return HAS_20_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_20_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_25_SLAYER = {
	9, 86, 60, 35
};

public static int giveTask25() {
	return HAS_25_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_25_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_32_SLAYER = {
	9, 86, 60, 35, 1648
};

public static int giveTask32() {
	return HAS_32_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_32_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_40_SLAYER = {
	9, 86, 60, 35, 1648
};

public static int giveTask40() {
	return HAS_40_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_40_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_45_SLAYER = {
	9, 86, 60, 35, 1648
};

public static int giveTask45() {
	return HAS_45_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_45_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_50_SLAYER = {
	9, 86, 60, 35, 1648, 1653
};

public static int giveTask50() {
	return HAS_50_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_50_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_55_SLAYER = {
	9, 86, 60, 35, 1648, 1653
};

public static int giveTask55() {
	return HAS_55_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_55_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_60_SLAYER = {
	9, 86, 60, 35, 1648, 1653
};

public static int giveTask60() {
	return HAS_60_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_60_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_65_SLAYER = {
	9, 86, 60, 35, 1648, 1653
};

public static int giveTask65() {
	return HAS_65_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_65_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_70_SLAYER = {
	9, 86, 60, 35, 1648, 1653
};

public static int giveTask70() {
	return HAS_70_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_70_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_75_SLAYER = {
	1615, 1610
};

public static int giveTask75() {
	return HAS_75_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_75_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_80_SLAYER = {
	1615, 1610, 1613
};

public static int giveTask80() {
	return HAS_80_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_80_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static final int[] HAS_85_SLAYER = {
	1615, 1610, 1613
};

public static int giveTask85() {
	return HAS_85_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_85_SLAYER.length)];
}

/*
npc = 8133	Corporeal_Beast			785	1250
npc = 8349	Tormented_Demon		450	250
2636 nex
npc = 3340	Giant_Mole		230	326
npc = 5666
50 kbd
*/
public static final int[] HAS_90_SLAYER = {
	8133, 8349, 2636, 3340, 5666, 50
};

public static int giveTask90() {
	return HAS_90_SLAYER[(int) (Math.random() * HAS_90_SLAYER.length)];
}

public static void appendSlayerTask(Client c) {
	if (c.playerLevel[18] == 1) {
		c.slayerTask = giveTask1();
		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(15);
		c.talk2("Oh, I see you're new to Slayer! Well, I'll start you off", "with " + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s. Good luck!", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] > 1 && c.playerLevel[18] < 5) {
		c.slayerTask = giveTask1();
		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(25);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 5 && c.playerLevel[18] < 10) {
		c.slayerTask = giveTask5();
		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(30);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 10 && c.playerLevel[18] < 15) {
		c.slayerTask = giveTask10();
		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 15 && c.playerLevel[18] < 20) {
		c.slayerTask = giveTask15();
		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 20 && c.playerLevel[18] < 25) {
		c.slayerTask = giveTask20();
		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 25 && c.playerLevel[18] < 32) {
		c.slayerTask = giveTask25();
		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 32 && c.playerLevel[18] < 40) {
		c.slayerTask = giveTask32();
		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 40 && c.playerLevel[18] < 45) {
		c.slayerTask = giveTask40();
		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 45 && c.playerLevel[18] < 50) {
		c.slayerTask = giveTask45();
		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 50 && c.playerLevel[18] < 55) {

		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);

		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 70 && c.playerLevel[18] < 75) {

		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 75 && c.playerLevel[18] < 80) {

		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 80 && c.playerLevel[18] < 85) {
		c.slayerTask = giveTask80();
		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 85 && c.playerLevel[18] < 90) {
		c.slayerTask = giveTask85();
		c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
	if (c.playerLevel[18] >= 90) {
		int randomShit = Misc.random(20);
		if(randomShit == 20) {//gives boss task
			c.slayerTask = giveTask90();
			c.taskAmount = 1 + Misc.random(4);
		} else if(randomShit == 19) {
			c.slayerTask = giveTask5();
			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		} else if(randomShit == 18) {
			c.slayerTask = giveTask10();
			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		} else if(randomShit == 17) {
			c.slayerTask = giveTask15();
			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		} else if(randomShit == 16) {
			c.slayerTask = giveTask20();
			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);	
		} else if(randomShit == 15) {
			c.slayerTask = giveTask25();
			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);	
		} else if(randomShit == 14) {

			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);

			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);

			c.slayerTask = giveTask60();
			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);	
		} else if(randomShit == 7) {
			c.slayerTask = giveTask65();
			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		} else if(randomShit == 6) {
			c.slayerTask = giveTask70();
			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);	
		} else if(randomShit == 5) {
			c.slayerTask = giveTask75();
			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);	
		} else if(randomShit == 4) {
			c.slayerTask = giveTask80();
			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);					
		} else {
			c.slayerTask = giveTask85();
			c.taskAmount = 15 + Misc.random(35);
		}	
		c.talk2("Excellent, you're doing great! Your new task is to kill", "" + c.taskAmount + " " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s.", 1599);
	}
}

}[/code]

in clickingButtons

} else if (c.dialogueAction == 5) { Slayer.appendSlayerTask(c); } else if (c.dialogueAction == 6) { Slayer.appendSlayerTask(c);

In DialogueHandler

case 11: sendNpcChat4("Hello, adventurer", "I am the daughter of Duradel", "I can assign you slayer tasks if you'd like", "Would you like a slayer task?", c.talkingNpc, "Kuradel"); c.nextChat = 12; break; case 12: sendOption2("Yes I would like a slayer task.", "No I would not like a slayer task."); c.dialogueAction = 5; break; case 13: sendNpcChat4("Hello, adventurer", "I am the daughter of Duradel", "I can assign you slayer tasks if you'd like", "Would you like a slayer task?", c.talkingNpc, "Kuradel"); c.nextChat = 14; break; case 14: sendOption2("Yes I would like an easier task.", "No I would like to keep my task."); c.dialogueAction = 6; break;

in client.java

[code]public String GetNpcName(int NpcID) {
for (int i = 0; i < NPCHandler.maxListedNPCs; i++) {
if (NPCHandler.NpcList[i] != null) {
if (NPCHandler.NpcList[i].npcId == NpcID) {
return NPCHandler.NpcList[i].npcName;
}
}
}
return “asshole_rule”;
}

public void talk2(String text, String text2, int npc) {
	getPA().sendFrame200(4902, 592);
	getPA().sendFrame126(GetNpcName(npc), 4903);
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 4904);
	getPA().sendFrame126(text, 4905);
	getPA().sendFrame126(text2, 4906);
	getPA().sendFrame126("", 4907);
	getPA().sendFrame75(npc, 4902);
	getPA().sendFrame164(4901);
}[/code]

you might need to replace this also

public void appendSlayerExperience(int i) { Client c = (Client)PlayerHandler.players[npcs[i].killedBy]; if(c != null) { if (c.slayerTask == npcs[i].npcType){ c.taskAmount--; c.getPA().addSkillXP(npcs[i].MaxHP * Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE, 18); if (c.taskAmount <= 0) { c.getPA().addSkillXP((npcs[i].MaxHP * 8) * Config.SLAYER_EXPERIENCE, 18); c.slayerTask = -1; int points = Misc.random(5) + 5; c.slayerPoints += points; if (!c.getPA().wearing2xRing()) c.sendMessage("You have received " + points + " slayer points for this. You now have " + c.slayerPoints + " points"); else { c.sendMessage("You have received " + points * 2 + " as it is doubled. You now have " + c.slayerPoints + " points"); c.slayerPoints += points; } c.sendMessage("You completed your slayer task. Please see a slayer master to get a new one."); } } } }

Post any errors.

inb4 i see another imposter on r-s trying to be me posting this.[/quote]

[quote=“AtomicInt_”]Add slayer gem, noob.

[code=java]
public static void checkGem(Client c) {
c.usingSlayerGem = true;
c.sendFrame126(“How am I doing so far?”, 2494);
c.sendFrame126(“Who are you?”, 2495);
c.sendFrame126(“Where are you?”, 2496);
c.sendFrame126(“Could I have a new task?”, 2497);
c.sendFrame126(“Nothing really.”, 2498);
c.sendFrame164(2492);
c.flushOutStream();
}

public static void gemTalking(Client c, int actionButtonId) {
	switch (actionButtonId) {
		case 9190: // How a doing so far?
			if (c.slayerTask != -1 && c.slayerTask > 0) {
				c.talk2("You're currently assigned to kill " + c.GetNpcName(c.slayerTask) + "s only", "" + c.taskAmount + " more to go.", 1599);
			} else if (c.slayerTask <= 0) {
				c.talk2("You need something new to hunt.  Come and ask me", "when you can and I'll give you a new task.", 1599);
			}
			break;

		case 9191: // Who are you?
			c.talk("My name is Duradel; I'm a Slayer Master.", 1599);
			break;

		case 9192: // Where are you?
			c.talk2("You'll find me at the Slayer Tower. I'll be here", "when you need a task.", 1599);
			break;

		case 9193: // May I have a new task?
			c.talk2("Your task has been cleared. Here is", "another task.", 1599);
			c.slayerTask = -1;
			c.taskAmount = -1;				
			c.clearedTask = true;
			appendSlayerTask(c);
			break;

		case 9194:
			c.talkPlayer("Nothing really.", "");
			break;
	}
}

[/code][/quote]

I will be using this, please don’t remove it.
